name: Windows 10 Pokemon Showdown Theme
description: It's a style I made for those of you who have Windows 10, it fits the dark color pallet of Windows 10 pretty nicely. The unusual parts: the parts I was testing a lot with were the userlist and the battle layout. All of that mixed up with a pretty awesome background ;D If you want to talk to me about any bugs or problem with the css contact me on origin, I'm usually under the name Master Float.
